uh, sorry it takes so long for me to respond. I have returned to working on navigables implementation for LibWeb and seems like I found another bug https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9686.

content.body: I will let you know once I've tried to actually implement your suggestion to solve destroy/abort bug.

content.body: vhilla: I guess it's not just up to WebKit though, if Chromium and Gecko want to have this specific divide there's nothing really stopping you from working on specifying it, unless Yusuke comes up with a strong reason not to, but I kinda doubt it
content.formatted_body: vhilla: I guess it's not just up to WebKit though, if Chromium and Gecko want to have this specific divide there's nothing really stopping you from working on specifying it, unless Yusuke comes up with a strong reason not to, but I kinda doubt it

So since Ian Hickson worked on HTML, is it correct we added only these new elements:

1. Custom elements
2. slot
3. search

?
